title.bibl: Miscellaneous Material Belonging to D. L. C. Percy, 2559 W. Division St. Minutes of the General Assembly of the Members of the Russian Center of the City of Chicago, held on March 2, 1929, at the quarters of the Ymca, 1621 W. Division St.

div.bibl: Miscellaneous Material Belonging to D. L. C. Percy, 2559 W. Division St. Minutes of the General Assembly of the Members of the Russian Center of the City of Chicago, held on March 2, 1929, at the quarters of the YMCA, 1621 W. Division St.

body.p: The assembly is called to order at 9 p. m. Present: Mr. V. D. Maslov, Mr. K. L. Kotsyubinsky, Dr. L. G. Pertsov, Mrs. S. D. Pertsov, Mr. S. C. Prokopov, Mrs. Y. M. Prokopov, Mr. J. S. Zatsarinny, and Mr. J. Kashirkin.
Order of the business of the day:

The secretary, Mr. Maslov, reads the minutes after the chairman, Mr. Prokopov, talked a long time concerning these minutes. After that Mr. Prokopov resigns the office of chairman, and Mr. Maslov, the secretary, takes his place and conducts the session right to the end.
As the membership of the Center is very small it is resolved to let Mr. Maslov, the secretary, fulfill also the duties of chairman and treasurer.
The financial report of Mrs. Y. M. Prokopov, the former treasurer, stands as follows:
Mr. J. Kashirkin is unanimously admitted into the membership of the Russian Center.
The monthly dues for the months of February and March ($3.25) were received by Mr. Maslov.
The assembly is adjourned at 10:45 P. M.
